mapper.insert:
select house_seq from dual
insert into house( house_id, city, address, price, completed, floor, housesize, bus, subway, convini, hospital, aircon, bathroom, parking, washer, pet, autolock ) values( 'm' || to_char(#{house_id}), #{city}, #{address}, #{price}, #{completed}, #{floor}, #{housesize}, #{bus}, #{subway}, #{convini}, #{hospital}, #{aircon}, #{bathroom}, #{parking}, #{washer}, #{pet}, #{autolock} )
